gcode.generative

Class BezierQuad

  • java.lang.Object
    • gcode.generative.BezierQuad

  • public class BezierQuad
extends java.lang.Object
    The BezierQuad class contains all the BezierPoints of the bezier curve.
    Author:
    Morgan Thibert

    • Constructor Detail

      • BezierQuad

        public BezierQuad(Gcoder _gcoder,
                  PVector pt1,
                  PVector pt2,
                  PVector pt3,
                  PVector pt4,
                  double _resolution)
        Parameters:
        _gcoder -
        pt1 - first Point
        pt2 - second Point
        pt3 - third Point
        pt4 - fourth Point
        _resolution - must be between 0 and 1. 0.1 is fast but not very beautiful, 0.01 is better but slower.
